content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Brained The target is stunned 1. Bludgeoning
Kidney Piercing The target is sickened 2. Piercing
Fingertipped Normal damage. Until healed, the target is clumsy 1 and can't use one of its hands (chosen randomly by the GM). Slashing
Eyeburn The target is blinded until the end of its next turn. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #20
